Two men were found dead in separate NYC subway trains amid extreme cold, while Brooklyn firefighters battled a three-alarm blaze in similar frigid conditions; power outages and transportation delays also affected the city as residents brace for more winter weather.

### Risks & Alerts

- Two men found dead in separate NYC subway trains amid extreme cold temperatures. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMidEFVX3lxTE9paXdPSEFxVE1PcGUwelBzN3ZOODNtZ2VURGRIQjFnYy1vOWtXYmhyUzdXODNlbjR1V0VYMVY3bkliV2Y0b0E3aEl1dGF2R1A5enNSMUx3ODllSVlLbXBNMlJ6UTlqOVpHYlJOMWxmR2dqZ1Zj?oc=5)
- Brooklyn firefighters are battling a three-alarm apartment blaze in extreme cold conditions. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMie0FVX3lxTE1XalVkdHFqTldXU1M1RjZ2Q0ZPQlR3aElWYXlBUDhUQVdaS3llX01ReUt0TENnTm9UVm15TG9XeHVpTlJUMURncTRTQzhwXzY1dVJ0LWFaRXN6clhiYkdHV2JOVVdfYWZhQ0phM1RVTlZyTW5oNTBGX0ZQZw?oc=5)
- Brooklyn power outage: Con Ed crews are working to restore electricity after snow and salt seeped underground. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- NYC Ferry service suspended during Monday rush hour due to extreme cold weather. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Downed wires and a disabled train are causing delays for NJ Transit commuters out of New York. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Forecasters are tracking a west-to-east storm with potential snow for NYC this weekend. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Search for a missing 15-year-old boy from Long Island is focusing on the East Side of NYC. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMipwFBVV95cUxQRjNRRGxhb0RCakVJaFJtczNRNmRKYTZzbk91Z3ZfdEtKMWZpVm8yMmlGRVFsVzVQbkZaeUVlUDRtYkt3VS1WM1R5eldtNWMyMW9QU1dSYUZ1XzBkZEYzSnhzaGlUUl83Tkh1dnp4SU9jRHlwWGk5djA5SGxzWGRMaTBDTTBMYm9PdWxuOXp4a3NHMnpQVVY0X1k3UnNST0RwejJNSWdTWQ?oc=5)
